entry.title: Endlessly trying
entry.summary:

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,399Chapters: 6/15Kudos: 42

Summary: Gods didn’t exist. At least that’s what Stiles believed at first. But since Stiles has seen literal werewolves he should probably not assume much about the current state of reality.Alas, gods exist, or maybe he’s hallucinating. Considering he’s been playing around a bunch of Deaton’s books (which he stole) trying to find a solution to the alpha pack problem and ended up dreaming about well… someone who looks like the physical manifestation of hot topic.

entry.title: FAIL WITH CONSEQUENCE (TWAT)
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,340Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 158

Summary: When Stiles undoes Scott’s werewolf bite, everything changes. Powerless and immune to the supernatural, Scott falls from the center to the fringe watching as Stiles becomes something… More. More than the boy who used to orbit someone else’s story, stepping into a role no one had a name for. Was it truly the path to becoming a True Alpha that made Scott a hero or had seeing himself as Beacon Hills paragon only amplified the illusion? *inspired by failcat's AU twitter post wherein Scott becomes human again learns he's a twat but really he learns nothing and continues to be a twat.

entry.title: Disturb the Silence Warnings of Death and Mayhem when the Banshees Scream
entry.summary:
Author: wazzzup

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,574Chapters: 4/15Kudos: 36

Summary: The last to go were her eyes, her kind eyes that had comforted him until the very end of her illness. Throughout it all, she’d looked at him with love, even when she forgot who he was.But now there was nothing there, just pits of a disfigured skull, and he felt his own tears begin to slide as his mother stood unrecognizable before him.A soul-piercing shriek erupted from her infinite mouth, rattling his bones and pulling him apart from the inside. It was a scream of grief, fury, and horror that made his lungs clench until there was not a single bit left within him. He tried to fight the suffocating feeling, but the screaming just wouldn’t stop, and he couldn’t leave.So instead, he joined her, throwing his head to the sky and letting it echo out of his empty body. The leaves shook, and the river raged, swirling around and ramming into them, but it did nothing but increase the strength of their cry.He’d never before felt so powerful and powerless at the same time.(Season 3A rewrite where Lydia isn't the only one going through changes)

entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,570Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 22

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: Fatal
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,423Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 7

Summary: His blue eyes were beautiful. Honestly, the most beautiful Stiles had ever seen. He ran his eyes over his body, certain that they were also deadly.He felt unable to move, his feet no longer obeying him. He was staring at Stiles, seeming to wonder why he was still there, standing, admiring him. As much as Stiles wanted to, he would never run away from him. He wanted answers to his questions, and he felt he could get them right then and there.Running away might be impossible. Screaming might bring him a quicker death. Staying, perhaps, for the slightest chance, an attempt to understand who Derek Hale was.Perhaps.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,239Chapters: 29/75Kudos: 32

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. entry.title: Werewolf Ettiquette is a Pain in the Ass
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,934Chapters: 7/11Kudos: 308

Summary: An unexpected visitor brings news that a rival Alpha is interested in taking over Beacon Hills. This means that Derek has to travel to Colorado to convince Werewolf Society to deny that petition. Packs with a mated alpha look stronger and more stable, so Derek needs a mate. Or more accurately, he needs someone to pretend to be his mate. Enter Stiles, who is somehow Derek's best option. Etiquette lessons bring them closer together than either of them expected, and the part of Derek that is more wolf than human is starting to take an interest.(Updates Wednesdays)

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,025Chapters: 24/36Kudos: 1

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,541Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 36

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,416Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcases in the living room. Beside the photo, in thick marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back out of pure spite. But in the corner, tiny letters catch his eye: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does.The next page has the present date scribbled in the corner and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone.I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest.Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf.We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. Derek runs a thumb over it in disbelief.---What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: The Way He Looks At Me
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,710Chapters: 2/8Kudos: 11

Summary: Derek Hale doesn’t know how to let people stay. Trauma taught him that love is dangerous, that opening the door only leads to more loss. First Hannah, then Laura. He’s still reeling, still holding himself together with frayed edges and silence.Stiles Stilinski doesn’t care. He shows up anyway, armed with too many questions, stubborn loyalty, and a steady presence Derek doesn’t know how to turn away. Somewhere between holding Derek up and keeping him grounded, Stiles falls in love.This is the story of Derek learning that healing is possible, that love can be safe, and that sometimes survival isn’t enough. Sometimes, you get to have more. And that people should be held accountable for their actions.

entry.title: Dragonfly
entry.summary:
Author: Tigerlillykaty

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,813Chapters: 4/24Kudos: 27

Summary: After an invasion of lethal fireflies, which end up eradicating humans and supernatural beings from the earth. Stiles travels to the past to prevent a dystopian and catastrophic future, meeting a teenager Derek Hale and his entire family... Can he save them all?
